product_name: Novara Cragmont Denim Bike Pants - Men's
long_description: Straight-legged jeans you can actually ride in, the men's Novara Cragmont Denim Bike Pants are stretchy, have hideable reflective trim and can hold a U-lock no problem. 5-pocket jeans are made of 2-way-stretch denim; higher back rise adds coverage on the saddle. Articulated knees offer a comfortable fit and freedom of movement. Gusset made of Schoeller fabric helps avoid chafing. Novara Cragmont Denim Bike Pants for men have a U-lock holder at back waist. Roll-up cuffs let you hide or deploy reflective tape; flaps on back pockets pull out to show reflectivity, tuck in to hide it.
